name: Basic Summary
description: Create a concise summary of the content
template:
Please create a concise summary of the following content:

{content}

Summary Requirements:
- Keep it brief and focused on key points
- Use clear, professional language
- Highlight the most important information
- Maximum {max_length} words

Summary:

variables.name: max_length
variables.description: Maximum number of words for summary

author: Selene System
